mapper.insert: insert into route (user_id, user_info, baby_name, baby_gender, parent_name, parent_phone, address, station) values (#{user_id}, #{user_info}, #{baby_name}, #{baby_gender}, #{parent_name}, #{parent_phone}, #{address}, #{station})
